languages.text: "Позволь немного утихомирить твою панику, кормчий, — я не допущу напрасных смертей. Потери в рабочей силе будут незначительными".

traits.locale_text: "Позволь немного утихомирить твою панику, кормчий, — я не допущу напрасных смертей. Потери в рабочей силе будут незначительными".

languages.text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
languages.original_text: "Позволь немного утихомирить твою панику, кормчий, — я не допущу напрасных смертей. Потери в рабочей силе будут незначительными".

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
"Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
"Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
"Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
"Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
"Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
"Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."

languages.text: « Si ça peut vous rassurer, maître timonier, sachez que je ferai preuve de la plus grande parcimonie. Les pertes au sein de l'équipage seront minimes. »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."

traits.locale_text: « Si ça peut vous rassurer, maître timonier, sachez que je ferai preuve de la plus grande parcimonie. Les pertes au sein de l'équipage seront minimes. »

languages.text: «Que no cunda el pánico, Maestro timonel, no permitiré que se eche a perder ninguna vida. Las pérdidas de tripulación serán imperceptibles».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."

traits.locale_text: «Que no cunda el pánico, Maestro timonel, no permitiré que se eche a perder ninguna vida. Las pérdidas de tripulación serán imperceptibles».

languages.text: 「マスター・ヘルムスマンン、あなたの不安を取り除かせてください。私は決して命を無駄にはしません。 乗組員の損失はごくわずかにとどまるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヘルムスマンン、あなたの不安を取り除かせてください。私は決して命を無駄にはしません。 乗組員の損失はごくわずかにとどまるでしょう」

languages.text: “我可以向你保证，舵手长，我绝不会容忍任何浪费生命的行为。我会把船员的损失控制在可以忽略不计的程度。”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."

traits.locale_text: “我可以向你保证，舵手长，我绝不会容忍任何浪费生命的行为。我会把船员的损失控制在可以忽略不计的程度。”

languages.text: "Erlaubt mir, Eure Panik zu zerstreuen, Meister Steuermann, indem ich Euch versichere, dass ich kein Leben vergeuden werde. Die Verluste innerhalb der Crew werden unbedeutend sein."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."

traits.locale_text: "Erlaubt mir, Eure Panik zu zerstreuen, Meister Steuermann, indem ich Euch versichere, dass ich kein Leben vergeuden werde. Die Verluste innerhalb der Crew werden unbedeutend sein."

languages.text: "Müsaadenle endişeni dindireyim Başserdümen. Hiçbir hayatın boşa gitmesine göz yummayacağım. Mürettebat içindeki zayiat, göz ardı edilebilir seviyede olacak."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to relieve your panic, Master Helmsman, by saying that I will not stand for any waste of life. The losses among the crew will be negligible."
